oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Belle Camp Candy Shop jingle - The Waking Crew - 1956-02-03 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of a Belle Camp Candy shop jingle, as performed by an unidentified female vocalist during a broadcast of a Belle Camp Candy sponsored WSM program ""The Waking Crew"" with announcer Dave Overton. Recording also contains news reports read by Bill Williams.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Dave Overton) -- Belle Camp Candy Shop jingle (Dottie Dillard) -- Dave Overton introduces Bill Williams -- News report (Bill Williams) -- Dave Overton talks -- Belle Camp Candy Shop jingle (Dottie Dillard)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Overton, Dave; Williams, Bill (Newsreader); Noble-Dury & Associates, Inc.; Dillard, Dottie;
